org.atmosphere.vibe.server

Class Sentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.server.Sentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractServerSocket<Sentence>

    public class Sentence
extends Object
implements AbstractServerSocket<Sentence>
    Sentence is a series of predicates that a group of socket have to follow. It makes easy to write one-liner action and uses internally built actions implementing Serializable that is typically needed in cluster environments. Use of Sentence is preferred to that of action if the goal is the same.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sends a given event with data.
      Sentence tag(String... names)
      Attaches given tags to the socket.
      Sentence untag(String... names)
      Detaches given tags from the socket.
